SEARCH
Package lt.viko.eif.vskuder.util

Class JAXBTransformer<T>

java.lang.Object
lt.viko.eif.vskuder.util.JAXBTransformer<T>
Type Parameters:
T - a generic type that represents the class of the object being transformed.
public class JAXBTransformer<T> extends Object
The JAXBTransformer class provides methods to transform an XML file to a POJO and a POJO to an XML file using JAXB.

    • transformToPOJO

      public T transformToPOJO(File xml)
      Transforms an XML file to a POJO.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      an object of the generic type that represents the POJO.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if a JAXBException occurs during transformation.

      Transforms a POJO to an XML file.
      Parameters:

      Throws:
